title: Blueprint for Office Access in the Future
itunes:title: Blueprint for Office Access in the Future
description:
Mark Ein, Chairman of Kastle Systems, explains the shifts in America’s workplace environment post COVID-19. He says managed security services will include touchless technology and monitoring for contact tracing.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
